body_html: I'm fine with this change. I think the only remaining question is whether we want to break existing models due to the rate to dilation_rate name change. @sguada, do you have a preference on this? We're definitely allowed to do it, but that doesn't necessarily mean we should.
body_text: I'm fine with this change. I think the only remaining question is whether we want to break existing models due to the rate to dilation_rate name change. @sguada, do you have a preference on this? We're definitely allowed to do it, but that doesn't necessarily mean we should.
body: I'm fine with this change. I think the only remaining question is whether we want to break existing models due to the `rate` to `dilation_rate` name change. @sguada, do you have a preference on this? We're definitely allowed to do it, but that doesn't necessarily mean we should.
